description:
Fixed my previous changes, as I incorrectly added crashes to the intro where they normally aren't. Removed them. Track should be more accurate now.
(via editor)
title: Tom Sawyer

description:
Changed measures in the intro section for the drum tab due to it having multiple incorrect note placements and missing cymbal hits.
(via editor)
title: Tom Sawyer

description: Someone uploaded the wrong file, so here's the correcto one again

description: Added Neil Peart's name, out of sheer respect
title: Tom Sawyer

description: Changed the tempo. It now is constant and doesn't change every few measures. Turned rhythm guitar up from 0 so it is audible. Also added names.
title: Tom Sawyer

description:
When I saw the solo on the last version, I twitched.

This is a 100% accurate tab from Rocksmith official DLC, this is the studio version. I took the drums and keyboard parts from the last version. This has also the not-so-loud rhythm guitar from studio version. If you feel this isn't accurate, sue Ubisoft ;)
title: Tom Sawyer
